Bicycle-powered generators: Incorporate a generator system into the bicycle frame that converts pedaling energy into electrical energy, providing a sustainable and eco-friendly source of power for homes, campsites, or outdoor events.

Smart bicycle helmets: Develop a helmet with integrated sensors and AI technology that monitors the rider's safety and well-being, providing real-time feedback and alerts to improve safety and prevent accidents.
Bicycle-powered water purification systems: Design a bicycle-powered water filtration system that can be used in remote areas with limited access to clean drinking water.

Bicycle-sharing platforms for rural communities: Develop a bicycle-sharing platform that connects rural communities with limited access to transportation, providing an affordable and convenient way to travel within their local area.
